price: “Sila situ gabbaramtoota keenya irratti (yakka) kana raawwatee Yaa Ibraahiim?” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
